mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: West Virginia History OnView and Storer College
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Group Portrait of Storer College Class of 1918, Harpers Ferry, W. Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Smith, Harry, Studio
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Group photo of Storer College graduates, class of 1918, in caps and gowns in front of building. First Row: McDaniel, Robertson, Case, Howell, Prof. Daniel, Warfield, Parker, Jackson, Neal. Second Row: Odetta Johnson, Margaret James, Myra McKirk, Vida McHipewell, Beatrice Calloway, Katie McDavis, Lucinda E. Ross.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: African American college students
